title.text: Propice-plan: toward a unified framework for planning and execution

abstract.text: In this paper, we investigate the links between planning and plans execution. We propose a new approach (Propice-Plan) which integrates both activities. It implements supervision and execution capabilities, combined with different planning techniques: -- plan synthesis to complement existing operational plans; and -- anticipation planning to advise the execution for the best option to take when facing choices (by anticipating plans execution), and to forecast problems that may arise due to unforeseen situations.
